features.title: Everything You Need For Epic RPG Adventures
features.subtitle: Whether you're a Dungeon Master or a Player, Questr simplifies finding and organizing your next RPG campaign.

feature1.title: For DMs
feature1.description: Create campaigns with rich descriptions, define your system, tone, and play style to attract the perfect players.

feature2.title: For Players
feature2.description: Browse campaigns, join a game, and immerse yourself in a world of adventure.

feature3.title: Easy & Intuitive
feature3.description: In just a few clicks, create or join a campaign. No bureaucracy, just roll your dice and start playing!

feature4.title: Beta Perks
feature4.description: Join our beta and receive early access plus a special border and 'Founder' title for your profile.

howItWorks.title: How Questr Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Finding or creating your perfect RPG group has never been easier

step1.title: Discover
step1.description: Browse available campaigns or create your own. Filter by game system, play style, session frequency, and more.

step2.title: Create or Join
step2.description: DMs can craft detailed campaign listings with all the info players need. Players can browse and apply to join games that match their preferences.

step3.title: Connect
step3.description: Once approved, connect with your group through our integrated chat or your preferred platform. Schedule sessions and coordinate details.

step4.title: Play
step4.description: Roll initiative and begin your adventure! After sessions, leave feedback to help others find great groups and DMs.

futureFeatures.title: What the Future Holds
futureFeatures.subtitle: We aim to be an RPG platform that is accessible to everyone. We won't stop at campaigns - we plan to create a complete online tabletop RPG ecosystem.

feature1.title: Virtual Tabletop Integration
feature1.description: Seamlessly integrate with popular VTT platforms like Roll20, Foundry VTT, and more for a complete gaming experience.

feature2.title: Character Sheet Management
feature2.description: Create, manage, and share character sheets with your group. Support for multiple RPG systems and custom sheets.

feature3.title: Advanced Communication Tools
feature3.description: Built-in voice and video chat, dice rolling, and campaign notes sharing to enhance your gaming sessions.

feature4.title: Campaign Scheduling & Reminders
feature4.description: Smart scheduling system with automatic reminders, timezone handling, and session planning tools.

feature5.title: Achievement & Reward System
feature5.description: Earn badges, titles, and rewards for participation, creativity, and helping build the community.

feature6.title: Marketplace & Content Creation
feature6.description: Share custom campaigns, maps, and content with the community. Support creators and discover amazing content.
